name: Peel Social Lab Seminar: Translating Research for the Wider Public
description: This is a seminar course where students work on data from the Peel Social Lab to produce various media to translate sociological findings for a broader audience. [24S]
prerequisites: SOC205H5/SOC231H5, SOC221H5 and SOC222H5, completed at least 13.0 credits, P.I.
